root.name: Intrusion 2
root.description: OverviewInspired by many old-style platform games Intrusion 2 tries to capture the feeling of those games from an age ago. The story is classic: a secret organization is developing weapons and you have to stop them. The game has 9 fairly large levels for the player to beat before the final battle will destroy the organization. Expect lots of jumping, shooting and killing baddies along the way.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS:Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7Processor:2 GHzMemory:1 GB RAMGraphics:DirecX 9 compatibleDirectXÂ®:9.0Hard Drive:100 MB HD spaceAdditional:supports XBox ControllerRecommendedProcessor:2.4 GHzMemory:2 GB RAMAdditional:supports XBox Controller
